title: Analysis of f from graph of f' part - a

content.description: The figure above shows the graph of f′ , the derivative of a function f. The domain of f is the set of all real numbers x such that−10≤x≤10.
content.question: For what values of x does the graph of f have a horizontal tangent?

frqParts.text: For what values of x does the graph of f have a horizontal tangent?

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
